positive_examples: This is an example of semantic network.
The semantic network demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed semantic network in this context.
A typical case of semantic network would involve these features.
The concept of semantic network applies here.
A network representation where nodes represent concepts and edges represent semantic relationships between them.
negative_examples: This is an example of neural activation network, not semantic network.
This represents conceptual network in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: NeuralActivationNetwork, or other types of ConceptualNetwork

definition: A knowledge representation using nodes for concepts and edges for relationships.
